attributes.action: Bin the knives. Bliss magazine calls for knife amnesty in schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the time of creating this petition, at least fifteen teenagers in the UK had been stabbed to death in 2007 alone. Teenage knife crime has hit an all time high and it’s leading to teenage deaths every few weeks.

Research suggests that a third of under 16s regularly carry a knife. Bliss is determined to make it stop.

Records show that in the 12 month period following a four week knife amnesty in 1993 murders fell by 26%. It's a step in the right direction. Bliss wants to encourage teenagers to give up their knives and arrange their own amnesty in schools.
